conclusion: Violation of Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF DOMBO BEHEER B.V. v. THE NETHERLANDS - [Russian Translation]

scl: Lüdi v. Switzerland judgment of 15 June 1992, Series A no. 238, p. 20, para. 43;Schuler-Zgraggen v. Switzerland judgment of 24 June 1993, Series A no. 263, p. 21, para. 66;Albert and Le Compte v. Belgium judgment of 10 February 1983, Series A no. 58, p. 20, para. 39;Feldbrugge v.
